title: Emacs config for Dvorak layout
author: scapbi
content: readme.md emacs config parts are reusable, highly customized hard use -of--box.highlights:extensive of variable-width font ( non-code texts) improve readability.custom fontset multi-lingual texts.obsessively home-grown color theme.vim navigation/editing through evil.heavily tweaked key bindings dvorak layout. git clone --recursive https://github.com/ubolonton/.emacs.d
